item.title: ASUS India partners with Zepto for quick delivery of accessories
item.dc:creator: Vishwamoorthy
item.description:
ASUS India has partnered with Zepto, a popular quick commerce platform for delivering its accessories in a quicker manner across major cities of India. Starting today, ASUS started delivering its premium range of mice and keyboards in NCR, Mumbai, Chennai, and Bengaluru through the Zepto app. With this move, ASUS is aiming to catch up … Continue reading "ASUS India partners with Zepto for quick delivery of accessories"

The post ASUS India partners with Zepto for quick delivery of accessories first appeared on Fone Arena.

item.title: HUAWEI Band9 and FreeBuds SE2 launched in India
item.dc:creator: Srivatsan Sridhar
item.description:
HUAWEI has officially launched the HUAWEI Band9, the company’s latest smart band in India, after taking pre-orders earlier this week. It has also launched the HUAWEI FreeBuds SE2 alongside. HUAWEI Band9 The HUAWEI Band9 has a 1.47-inch AMOLED 2.5D touch screen, supports personalized dial that matches user’s outfit, offers 50m (5 ATM) water resistance, heart … Continue reading "HUAWEI Band9 and FreeBuds SE2 launched in India"

The post HUAWEI Band9 and FreeBuds SE2 launched in India first appeared on Fone Arena.

item.title: Lava International partners with HDB Financial Services to boost smartphone affordability for offline buyers
item.dc:creator: Srivatsan Sridhar
item.description:
In a move set to make smartphones more accessible to Indian consumers, Lava International Limited has announced a strategic partnership with HDB Financial Services. This collaboration aims to introduce consumer financing schemes specifically designed to enhance affordability and accessibility for offline buyers. The initiative underscores Lava’s dedication to its customer-centric philosophy and its commitment to … Continue reading "Lava International partners with HDB Financial Services to boost smartphone affordability for offline buyers"

item.title: HONOR Magic7 Pro with 6.8″ 120Hz LTPO display, Snapdragon 8 Elite, 200MP telephoto camera, IP68 + IP69 ratings launched in Europe
item.dc:creator: Srivatsan Sridhar
item.description:
HONOR just launched the HONOR Magic7 Pro, the company’s latest flagship smartphone in Europe, after it was introduced for the Chinese market last year. item.title: TCL launches world’s largest 115″ QD Mini LED TV in India
item.dc:creator: Srivatsan Sridhar
item.category: TCL world's largest QD Mini LED TV
world's largest QD Mini LED TV
item.description:
TCL India is making a significant push for industry leadership with the introduction of its 115X955 Max television. This new model, touted as the world’s largest QD Mini LED TV, represents a substantial advancement in home entertainment technology, promising enhanced picture quality and a more immersive viewing experience. item.title: Global smartphone shipments increase 6.4% YoY in 2024: IDC
item.dc:creator: Vishwamoorthy
item.description:
International Data Corporation (IDC) has released its latest Worldwide Smartphone Market Tracker, reporting that smartphone shipments increased 2.4% year-over-year (YoY) to 331.7 million units in 4Q24. In 2024, the market saw a 6.4% growth and 1.24 billion shipments, marking a strong recovery after two challenging years of decline. Apple and Samsung remained the top two … Continue reading "Global smartphone shipments increase 6.4% YoY in 2024: IDC"

The post Global smartphone shipments increase 6.4% YoY in 2024: IDC first appeared on Fone Arena.

item.title: moto g 5G (2025) and moto g Power 5G (2025) announced
item.dc:creator: Srivatsan Sridhar
item.description:
motorola has announced the moto g 5G 2024 and moto g Power 5G 2024, the company’s latest mid-range smartphone in the g series for the US market, as the successors to last year’s models. item.title: ASUS NUC 14 Essential compact, efficient mini PC announced

item.description:
ASUS has launched its latest offering in the mini PC market, the ASUS NUC 14 Essential, after introducing the NUC 14 Pro last year. This ultra-compact device is designed as an entry-level solution, powered by Intel’s latest Core N-series processor. item.title: Portronics Volt 20 6-in-1 Power Socket launched
item.dc:creator: Srivatsan Sridhar
item.description:
Portronics has launched Volt 20, a compact, versatile, and powerful 6-in-1 desktop power socket designed to streamline how we charge and power our increasingly demanding array of devices. The Volt 20 packs a diverse array of ports that include a 20W Type-C Power Delivery (PD) port, offering blazing-fast charging for the latest smartphones, tablets, and … Continue reading "Portronics Volt 20 6-in-1 Power Socket launched"

item.title: Royal Enfield Flying Flea EV to be powered by Snapdragon Car-to-Cloud platform
item.dc:creator: Tamil G
item.description:
Flying Flea, the new electric vehicle (EV) brand from Royal Enfield, has announced its collaboration with Qualcomm Technologies to integrate the Snapdragon QWM2290 system-on-chip (SoC) and Snapdragon Car-to-Cloud Platform into its upcoming electric motorcycles. Following its global unveiling in Milan in November 2024, Flying Flea is designed to seamlessly blend technology, style, and performance.
